result.eng: The translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.
result.ga: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maith
result.orig: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maith
result.html: B'fhearr don aistritheoir ní amháin an téacs a léamh go cúramach ach roinnt taighde a dhéanamh chomh maithThe translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr don aistriṫeoir ní aṁáin an téacs a léaṁ go cúramaċ aċ roinnt taiġde a ḋéanaṁ ċoṁ maiṫThe translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.

result.eng: You will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ga: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.orig: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.html: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cead agat an scrúdú a ḋéanaṁ an aṫuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.

result.eng: What do you need to do the job?
result.ga: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamh
result.html: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamhWhat do you need to do the job?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫeastaíonn uait ċun an jab a ḋéanaṁWhat do you need to do the job?

result.eng: What made you do that?
result.ga: Cad a thug ort é sin a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cad a thug ort é sin a dhéanamh
result.html: Cad a thug ort é sin a dhéanamhWhat made you do that?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫug ort é sin a ḋéanaṁWhat made you do that?

result.eng: What can I do?
result.ga: Cad is féidir liom a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cad is féidir liom a dhéanamh
result.html: Cad is féidir liom a dhéanamhWhat can I do?
result.ponchtml: Cad is féidir liom a ḋéanaṁWhat can I do?

result.eng: We must do it right this time.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid é a dhéanamh i gceart an uair seo
result.orig: Caithfidh muid é a dhéanamh i gceart an uair seo
result.html: Caithfidh muid é a dhéanamh i gceart an uair seoWe must do it right this time.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid é a ḋéanaṁ i gceart an uair seoWe must do it right this time.

result.eng: When do I need to make payment?
result.ga: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamh
result.html: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamhWhen do I need to make payment?
result.ponchtml: Caṫain is gá dom íocaíoċt a ḋéanaṁWhen do I need to make payment?

result.eng: We saw a cross-shaped memorial.
result.ga: Chonaic muid leac cuimhneacháin ar dhéanamh croise
result.orig: Chonaic muid leac cuimhneacháin ar dhéanamh croise
result.html: Chonaic muid leac cuimhneacháin ar dhéanamh croiseWe saw a cross-shaped memorial.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic muid leac cuiṁneaċáin ar ḋéanaṁ croiseWe saw a cross-shaped memorial.

result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.orig: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.html: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...
result.ponchtml: Cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.eng: Only you can do the job.
result.ga: Ní féidir le héinne ach leat féin an jab a dhéanamh
result.orig: Ní féidir le héinne ach leat féin an jab a dhéanamh
result.html: Ní féidir le héinne ach leat féin an jab a dhéanamhOnly you can do the job.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir le héinne aċ leat féin an jab a ḋéanaṁOnly you can do the job.

result.eng: This is not the correct way to make pancakes!
result.ga: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamh
result.orig: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamh
result.html: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamhThis is not the correct way to make pancakes!
result.ponchtml: Ní hé seo an bealaċ ceart ċun pancóga a ḋéanaṁThis is not the correct way to make pancakes!

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ga: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.html: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ tuairim dá laġad orm cad ba ċóir dom a ḋéanaṁ aċ ċuir sise coṁairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.eng: What can I do for you?
result.ga: Céard is féidir liom a dhéanamh duit
result.orig: Céard is féidir liom a dhéanamh duit
result.html: Céard is féidir liom a dhéanamh duitWhat can I do for you?
result.ponchtml: Céard is féidir liom a ḋéanaṁ duitWhat can I do for you?

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-EabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i Nua-EaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ga: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.orig: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.html: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ponchtml: Is beag sásaṁ a ḃaintear as aṫċúrsáil a ḋéanaṁ ar áḃar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile ċeana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.

result.eng: She could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ga: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.orig: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.html: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh deShe could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ léi gáire a ḋéanaṁ agus sin a mbeaḋ deShe could have laughed and that would be it.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
